title: paahi shreepathE
sahitya:
pAhi shrIpatE mOhanamUrtE bhAvayEnkhrItE 



(pAhi)







anupallavi







sAhAsAdhika garvaharAsura vairinuta parama garimAlaya pAvana



(pAhi)







caraNam 1







tApasa gaNa hrdaya talimakrta viharaNa gOpa hatadi suta karuNA



rasavAsa



pApa ghana samIraNa pATala bimbAdhara tapanIya vibhUSaNa



dAsagaNa bhava-



tApa vibhanjana lOla sadAvara dAnacaNa kurumE kushalam



bhuvanEshvara 



(pAhi)







caraNam 2







shArada shishi karasama vilasita mukha nIrada sadrshkAntE



nigama sannuta



smaramanjima haraNa surucira tanurucE hariNa mada shObhita



taruNEndu niTila



nArada shaunaka namyapada guruvindaradAkhila mauni budhAvana



kOmaLa



(pAhi)







caraNam 3







bhAnu shshAnka nayana vAraya pApajAtam vanaruhAsana hara



valaripu pUjita



kanaka ruci vasana kamanIya tara kIrtE syAnandUrapurAdhIsha



sarasijanAbha



mauni samAja bhayApaha manjuhasEndu-rucE guNasAgara sundara



(pAhi)
